description:
Blur image elements

Usually, we hate it when pictures turn out blurry – and any photo editor can fix that – but it takes a dedicated tool to make blurred images ADD to the quality of an image. Movavi Photo Focus lets you use photo blur as a creative way to tell amazing visual stories!
- New polished and user-friendly interface: all the tools are easily accessible from the start page
- New blur modes made specifically for landscape and architecture photos
- Added bokeh blur: now you can add light leaks to your photo
- New tools for applying motion-like effect to your blurred photos
